title: AdvancedBan汉化
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: robbit
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 robbit 于 2018-7-22 10:00 编辑 

这是原帖中 config.yml 文件没有汉化的地方，其他两个文件里没有汉化的内容太多了...# 这些是当警告达一定次数的时候将会执行的命令
# 如果你跳过了一个数字，其会自动执行之前的指令
# 你也可以使用非AdvancedBan的命令，如/clear %PLAYER%等。
# 变量：%PLAYER%, %REASON%, %COUNT%
WarnActions:
  3: "kick %PLAYER% &c&o这是你收到的第三次警告!"
  4: "tempban %PLAYER% 30m &c&o这是你收到的第四次警告!同时禁封 30 分钟!"
  5: "tempban %PLAYER% 5h &c&o这是你收到的第五次警告!同时禁封 5 小时!"
  6: "tempban %PLAYER% 7d &c&o这是你收到的第六次警告!同时禁封 7 天!"
  7: "tempban %PLAYER% 1mo &c&o这是你收到的第 %COUNT% 次警告!同时禁封 1 月!"
  10: "ban %PLAYER% &c&o这是你收到的第十次警告!彻底禁封!"
复制代码

replies.author: 诺尘_
replies.txt_content: 你发的帖子内就有汉化啊？你直接复制替换掉英文就可以了
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2018-7-24 11:47 编辑 

我这有份自己改好的汉化版本，你可以看情况再改
如果乱码的话可以试着用Notepad++进行转码，
根据你的提问记录看你像是新手腐竹，有问题可以站内找我或者加我QQ



Messages.yml
(8.03 KB, 下载次数: 34)



2018-7-24 11:40 上传
点击文件名下载附件









config.yml
(3.83 KB, 下载次数: 30)



2018-7-24 11:40 上传
点击文件名下载附件






//Messages
General:
  Prefix: "&2[安全系统]"
  NoPerms: "&c你没有操作权限"
  LayoutNotFound: "&c没有叫做 %NAME%的格式"
  # This will be the replacement for the %DURATION% variable
  TimeLayoutD: "%D%天 %H%小时 %M%分钟 %S%秒"
  TimeLayoutH: "%H%小时 %M%分钟 %S%秒"
  TimeLayoutM: "%M%分钟 %S%秒"
  TimeLayoutS: "%S% 秒"
  FailedFetch: "&c云端没有接收 %NAME% 的UUID! 详情请看控制台."


Ban:
  Usage: "&6用法：/ban [玩家] [原因]"
  Done: "&c%NAME% &6被成功封禁!"
  AlreadyDone: "&c%NAME% &6已经被封禁了!"
  Exempt: "&6你不能封禁 &c%NAME%"
  Layout:
  - "&c&l您的账号已被封禁！"
  - "&7"
  - "&7"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b永不过期"
  - "&7"
  - "&e&l>>> 如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主 <<<"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6封禁"
  - "&6原因：&e%REASON%"

Ipban:
  Usage: "&6用法：/banip [名字/IP] [原因]"
  Layout:
  - "&c&l当前IP已被禁止登录！"
  - "&7"
  - "&7"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b永不过期"
  - "&7"
  - "&e&l>>> 如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主 <<<"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6封禁IP"
  - "&6原因：&e%REASON%"
  IpNotCashed: "&6错误：没有查询到%NAME%的IP地址"

Tempban:
  Usage: "&6用法：/tempban [玩家] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs] [原因]"
  MaxDuration: "&6当前用户组不能封禁超过 %MAX% 秒"
  Layout:
  - "&c&l您的账号已被封禁！"
  - "&7"
  - "&7"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b%DURATION%"
  - "&7"
  - "&e&l>>> 如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主 <<<"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6临时封禁"
  - "&6原因：&e%REASON%"
  - "&6封禁时长：&e%DURATION%"

Mute:
  Usage: "&6用法：/mute [玩家] [原因]"
  Done: "&c%NAME% &6成功被禁言!"
  AlreadyDone: "&c%NAME% &6已经被禁言!"
  Exempt: "&6你不能禁言 &c%NAME%"
  Layout:
  - "&2[禁言通知]：&c您已经被管理员禁言"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b永不过期"
  - "&e如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6永久禁言"
  - "&6原因：&6%REASON%"

Tempmute:
  Usage: "&6用法：/tempmute [玩家] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs] [原因]"
  MaxDuration: "&6你不能禁言超过 %MAX%秒"
  Layout:
  - "&2[禁言通知]：&c您已经被管理员禁言"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b%DURATION%"
  - "&e如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6临时禁言"
  - "&6原因 &e%REASON%"
  - "&6禁言时间 &e%DURATION%"

Warn:
  Usage: "&6用法：/warn [玩家] [原因]"
  Done: "&c%NAME% &6被成功警告"
  Exempt: "&6你不能警告 &c%NAME%"
  Layout:
  - "&2[警告通知]&c您已被管理员予以警告"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b永不过期"
  - "&e截止至目前，您已被警告%COUNT%次"
  - "&e如果再次受到警告会被封禁1天，请注意！"
  - "&b如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6警告"
  - "&6原因：&e%REASON%"

Tempwarn:
  Usage: "&6用法：/tempwarn [玩家] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs] [原因]"
  MaxDuration: "&c你不能警告超过 %MAX% 秒"
  Layout:
  - "&2[警告通知]&c您已被管理员予以警告"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b%DURATION%"
  - "&e截止至目前，您已被警告%COUNT%次"
  - "&e如果再次受到警告会被封禁1天，请注意！"
  - "&b如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6临时警告"
  - "&6原因是 &e%REASON%"
  - "&6持续时间 &e%DURATION%"

Kick:
  Usage: "&6用法：/kick [玩家] [原因]"
  Done: "&c%NAME% &6被请出服务器"
  NotOnline: "&c%NAME% &6已经是离线状态"
  Exempt: "&6你不能踢出 &c%NAME%"
  Layout:
  - "&c&l您已被请出服务器！"
  - "&7"
  - "&7"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&7"
  - "&e&l>>>   己所不欲，勿施于人，请勿熊服！   <<<"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6请出服务器"
  - "&6原因是 &e%REASON%"


UnBan:
  Usage: "&6用法：/unban [玩家/IP]"
  NotPunished: "&a%NAME% &6没有被封禁"
  Done: "&a%NAME% &6已被解除封禁"

UnMute:
  Usage: "&6用法：/unmute [玩家]"
  NotPunished: "&a%NAME% 没有被禁言"
  Done: "&a%NAME% &6被成功解除禁言"

UnWarn:
  Usage: "&6用法：/unwarn [ID] or /unwarn clear [玩家]"
  NotFound: "&6找不到警告 #%ID%"
  Done: "&6警告 &a#%ID% &6被成功删除!"
  Clear:
    Empty: "&a%NAME% &6没有收到过警告!"
    Done: "&6清除 &a%COUNT% &6个警告"

UnPunish:
  Usage: "&6用法：/unpunish [ID]"
  NotFound: "&6不能找到惩罚 #%ID%"
  Done: "&6惩罚 &a#%ID% &6被成功删除!"


Banlist:
  Usage: "&6用法：/banlist <页码>"
  OutOfIndex: "&6错误页码 %PAGE%!"
  NoEntries: "&6这里还没有条目"
  Header:
  - "%PREFIX% &7封禁列表:"
  - "&c玩家/IP &8| &e持续时间 &8| &7处理人"
  - "&6类型 &8> &6原因"
  - "&7"
  Entry:
  - "&8[&e%DATE%&8]"
  - "&c%NAME% &8| &e%DURATION% &8| &7%OPERATOR%"
  - "&c%TYPE% &8> &7%REASON%"
  - "&7"
  Footer: "&6第 &e%CURRENT_PAGE% &6页 共 &e%TOTAL_PAGES% &6页 &8| &7封禁数量: &e%COUNT%"
  PageFooter: "&6使用 &e/banlist %NEXT_PAGE% &6查看下一页"

History:
  Usage: "&6用法：/history [玩家/IP] <页码>"
  OutOfIndex: "&c错误页码 %PAGE%!"
  NoEntries: "&c不能找到 %NAME% 的历史"
  Header:
  - "%PREFIX% &6 %NAME% 的封禁历史:"
  - "&c名字 &8| &e&持续时间 &8| &6处理人"
  - "&c类型 &8> &6原因"
  - "&6"
  Entry:
  - "&8[&e%DATE%&8]"
  - "&c%NAME% &8| &e%DURATION% &8| &7%OPERATOR%"
  - "&c%TYPE% &8> &7&o%REASON%"
  - "&7"
  Footer: "&7Page &e&o%CURRENT_PAGE% &7of &e&o%TOTAL_PAGES% &8| &7总条目: &e&o%COUNT%"
  PageFooter: "&7使用 &e&o/history %NAME% %NEXT_PAGE% &7查看下一页"

Warns:
  Usage: "&6用法：/warns [玩家] <页码>"
  OutOfIndex: "&c错误页码 %PAGE%!"
  NoEntries: "&6%NAME% 没有收到过警告"
  Header:
  - "%PREFIX% &6%NAME% 的警告:"
  - "&c名字 &8| &e持续时间 &8| &6警告人"
  - "&c#ID &8> &6原因"
  - "&6"
  Entry:
  - "&8[&e%DATE%&8]"
  - "&c%NAME% &8| &e%DURATION% &8| &6%OPERATOR%"
  - "&c&l#%ID% &8> &6%REASON%"
  - "&7"
  Footer: "&6第 &e%CURRENT_PAGE% &6页 共 &e%TOTAL_PAGES% &6页 &8| &6有效警告: &e%COUNT%"
  PageFooter: "&6使用 &e&6/warns %NAME% %NEXT_PAGE% &7"


Check:
  Usage: "&6用法：/check [玩家]"
  Header: "&6正在检查 &e%NAME%"
  UUID: "&6UUID：%UUID%"
  IP: "&6IP：&e%IP%"
  Geo: "&6国家：&e%LOCATION%"
  Mute: "&6禁言：&e%DURATION%"
  Ban: "&6封禁：&e%DURATION%"
  Warn: "&6警告：&e%COUNT%"
  NotFound: "&6没有找到 %NAME%"

Tempipban:
  Usage: "&6用法：/tempipban [玩家/IP] [Xmo/Xd/Xh/Xm/Xs] [原因]"
  MaxDuration: "&6当前用户组不能封禁超过 %MAX% 秒"
  Layout:
  - "&c&l当前IP已被禁止登录！"
  - "&7"
  - "&7"
  - "&6&l原因>>>   &b%REASON%"
  - "&6&l操作者>>>   &b%OPERATOR%"
  - "&6&l剩余时间>>>   &b%DURATION%"
  - "&7"
  - "&e&l>>> 如对此处罚有异议请联系操作管理员或服主 <<<"
  Notification:
  - "&c%NAME% &6被 &e%OPERATOR% &6临时封禁IP"
  - "&6原因：&e%REASON%"
  - "&6封禁时长：&e%DURATION%"

ChangeReason:
  Usage: "&6用法：/change-reason [ID or 封禁/禁言 玩家] [原因]"
  Done: "&6处罚 &a#%ID% &6已更新"
  NotFound: "&c没有找到这个处罚ID"
//Config
# AdvancedBan v2 - Coded by Leoko
# For each setting, there is a small description.
# Please read each description carefully before changing anything.
# For more information visit: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/advancedban.8695/
# Do you want your own Plugin or Website? Check out our Dev-Page: http://dev.skamps.eu

# If set to false all bans will be saved locally in a HSQLDB-Database
UseMySQL: false

# Set to false if you want to have only short messages in the console
# On startup and on the shutdown.
DetailedEnableMessage: true
DetailedDisableMessage: true

# This will be the default reason to be displayed if none is given
DefaultReason: "违反服务器规章制度"

# Change this if your server has a different time that your users.
# e.g.: ServerTime: 16:43 | Your Time: 13:43 | TimeDiff has to be set to -3
# You can check the server time with /systemPrefs
TimeDiff: 0

# This commands will be disabled for muted players
# A player wouldn't be able to bypass with eg "/minecraft:me"
MuteCommands:
- 'me'
- 'say'
- 'action'
- 'eaction'
- 'describe'
- 'edescribe'
- 'eme'
- 'w'
- 'm'
- 'pm'
- 'whisper'
- 'ewhisper'
- 'emsg'
- 'msg'
- 'etell'
- 'tell'
- 'er'
- 'r'
- 'reply'
- 'ereply'
- 'ac'
- 'eac'
- 'amsg'
- 'eamsg'
- 'ehelpop'

# These players will not be able to get punished in any way
# this also works if the player is offline
ExemptPlayers:
- 'Leoko'
- 'md5'
- 'dutchy1001'
- 'ItzSomebody'

# The date-format which will be used for the %DATE% variable
DateFormat: "dd.MM.yyyy-HH:mm"

# This is useful for bungeecord servers or server with permission systems which do not support *-Perms
# So if you enable this you can use ab.all instead of ab.* or ab.ban.all instead of ab.ban.*
# This does not work with negative permissions! e.g. -ab.all would not block all commands for that user.
EnableAllPermissionNodes: false

# If you use external REST-APIs they will have to respond in JSON
# The given APIs will only be used for NAME -> UUID
# For UUID -> NAME will either use the official MojangAPI or the InternFetcher
# To check if you can use the intern fetcher do /systemPerfs and compare your uuid
#   to ** you can see online on http://NamesMC.com
#   if they are similar we recommend using the InternFetcher
UUID-Fetcher:
  # If dynamic it set to true it will override the 'enabled' and 'intern' settings
  # and automatically detect the best possible uuid fetcher settings for your server.
  # Our recommendation: don't set dynamic to false if you don't have any problems.
  Dynamic: true
  Enabled: true
  Intern: false
  REST-API:
    URL: "https://api.mojang.com/users/profiles/minecraft/%NAME%?at=%TIMESTAMP%"
    Key: "id"
  BackUp-API:
    URL: "https://us.mc-api.net/v3/uuid/%NAME%"
    Key: "uuid"

# These are the commands that will be performed on warns
# If you skip a number the command from before will be performed
# You can also use non-AdvancedBan-Commands like 'broadcast' or 'clear %PLAYER%
# Variables: %PLAYER%, %REASON%, %COUNT%
WarnActions:
  2: "tempban %PLAYER% 1d 截止至目前，你已被警告2次，累计3次警告将被**7天，请注意！"
  3: "tempban %PLAYER% 7d 截止至目前，你已被警告3次，累计4次警告将被**14天，请注意！"
  4: "tempban %PLAYER% 14d 截止至目前，你已被警告4次，累计5次警告将被永久**，请注意！"
  5: "ban %PLAYER% 警告次数已达上限，现已永久封禁你的账号！"

# Here you can create permission-nodes for max-punishment-duration.
# The permission "ab.tempban.dur.1" would allow the player to ban max. for 600sec = 10min
# The permission "ab.tempwarn.dur.2" would allow the player to warn max. for 3600sec = 1h
# You can only create up to 10 perms. The perms can be overridden with "ab.COMMAND.dur.max"
TempPerms:
  1: 3600
  2: 7200
  3: 43200复制代码
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
